<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix script to handle 'sourcing dependent on task' and 'order dependent on task' fields reparent from 'sn_shop_task' to 'sn_spend_sdc_service_task'</description>
        <name>Task fields reparenting (May 2022)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryArr = [{
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_task^element=sourcing_decision_dependent_on_task',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Sourcing decision dependent on task (DEPRECATED)'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_task^element=task_completion_required',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Order dependent on task (DEPRECATED)'
        }
    }
];

function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}

function copyDataToNewColumns() {
    var query = 'sourcing_decision_dependent_on_task=yes' +
        '^OR' + 'task_completion_required=yes';

    var taskGr = new GlideRecord('sn_shop_task');
    taskGr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    taskGr.query();

    while (taskGr.next()) {
        var oldSourcingDependentValue = taskGr.getValue('sourcing_decision_dependent_on_task');
        var oldOrderDependentValue = taskGr.getValue('task_completion_required');

        taskGr.setValue('sourcing_dependent_on_task', oldSourcingDependentValue);
        taskGr.setValue('order_dependent_on_task', oldOrderDependentValue);

        taskGr.update();
    }
}

dictionaryArr.forEach(updateDictionary);
copyDataToNewColumns();]]></script>
